hypothesis_content.title: Intraday Momentum Reversal on Extreme Opening Gaps
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC opens with a gap down >3% from previous close during NEUTRAL/BEAR regimes, price exhibits mean-reverting momentum upward during the first 4 trading hours as overnight overreaction gets corrected.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Large opening gaps often reflect overnight sentiment extremes that get reassessed during regular trading hours. Current market volatility increases likelihood of exaggerated opening moves that reverse.
entry_conditions: BTC opening price ≤ 97% of previous day's close
Entry at 30 minutes after open if price remains within 0.5% of open

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price returns to 99% of previous day's close
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price declines further to 95% of previous day's close

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If price fails to show any upward momentum (≥0.5% recovery) within 2 hours of entry, or if opening gaps >3% lead to further declines >70% of the time in current regime.
